params._unlock_time: Timestamp when the lock expires. Must be in the future.
The new unlock timestamp. Must be greater than the current one.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the voting power of an address at the current block.

balanceOfAt(address,uint256).notice: Get the voting power of an address at a specific timestamp.

create_lock(uint256,uint256).notice: Create a new lock for a user.

increase_amount(uint256).notice: Increase the amount of tokens in an existing lock.

increase_unlock_time(uint256).notice: Extend the duration of an existing lock.

totalSupply().notice: Get the total voting power at the current block.

totalSupplyAt(uint256).notice: Get the total voting power at a specific timestamp.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw tokens after a lock has expired.
